question: 建設
sourceMnemonic: <kanji>Build</kanji> and <kanji>establish</kanji>. As you can guess from the kanji, this could refer both to the <vocabulary>construction</vocabulary> of buildings, as well as the <vocabulary>establishment</vocabulary> of an organization or structure.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
